AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: vlook.ai is a multimodal AI creation studio that brings the latest models together for images, video, and music at a low cost.
AboutPage.introduction: Hi there! vlook.ai is a multimodal AI creation studio powered by Gemini Nano Banana Pro, OpenAI Sora2, Google Veo 3.1, and Suno. Create images, videos, and music with a smooth workflow and affordable plans.

item-1.question: Is vlook an AI video, image, and music generator?
item-1.answer: Yes. vlook is an AI video, image, and music generator that lets you create multimodal content from prompts.

item-2.question: How do I generate AI video, images, or music?
item-2.answer: Enter a prompt or add a reference, choose a model, and generate AI video, images, or music in one studio.

item-3.question: How fast is generation?
item-3.answer: Speed depends on the model and input complexity, but vlook.ai is built for fast previews and iteration.

item-4.question: What makes vlook a strong AI video generator?
item-4.answer: vlook unifies leading models, offers fast previews, and makes AI video generation simple to iterate and export.

item-5.question: Are my outputs unique?
item-5.answer: Yes. Outputs are generated from your inputs, making each result unique to your request.

item-6.question: Will my exports have watermarks?
item-6.answer: Free outputs may include watermarks. Upgrade to remove watermarks on eligible plans.

item-7.question: Can I use outputs commercially?
item-7.answer: Paid plans allow commercial use for ads, promos, and product demos.

item-8.question: Do you offer a free trial?
item-8.answer: Yes. Start with free trial credits and explore core models.

item-9.question: How do I manage my plan?
item-9.answer: Upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime from your billing settings.

item-10.question: What is the refund policy?
item-10.answer: Refunds are available for eligible purchases. Contact support@vlook.ai.

item-11.question: Need help or a custom request?
item-11.answer: Email support@vlook.ai and we will get back quickly.

item-1.name: Jonathan Yombo
item-1.quote: vlook.ai lets me ship polished visuals in minutes. The multi-model choice is a game changer.

item-2.name: Yves Kalume
item-2.quote: I can move from image to video to music without leaving the studio. It is fast and affordable.

item-3.name: Yucel Faruksahan
item-3.quote: The Sora2 and Veo 3.1 results are clean and cinematic. vlook.ai saves me hours.

item-4.name: Anonymous author
item-4.quote: The smooth UI and quick previews make ideation effortless.

item-5.name: Shekinah Tshiokufila
item-5.quote: I love the balance of quality and price. vlook.ai keeps our content pipeline moving.

item-6.name: Oketa Fred
item-6.quote: The workflow feels modern and responsive. It is the easiest way to test multiple models.

item-7.name: Zeki
item-7.quote: Having Gemini Nano Banana Pro and Suno in one place is incredibly convenient.

item-8.name: Joseph Kitheka
item-8.quote: Our team creates ad creatives and sound beds in one tool now.

item-9.name: Khatab Wedaa
item-9.quote: vlook.ai delivers consistent results without the complexity.

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: I can iterate quickly and export assets ready for social and ads.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: Great quality, fair pricing, and a clean interface - exactly what creators need.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: If you want top models with a smooth workflow, vlook.ai is hard to beat.

faq.title: Nano Banana FAQ
faq.description: Quick answers for planning your next launch.

item-1.question: What formats can I export?
item-1.answer: PNG or JPEG, ready for ads and social.

item-2.question: Can I edit existing images?
item-2.answer: Yes. Use image-to-image with up to 10 references.

item-3.question: How much does each generation cost?
item-3.answer: Nano Banana runs at 4 credits per generation.

item-4.question: Is Nano Banana fast enough for daily content?
item-4.answer: It is tuned for quick iteration with stable outputs.

item-5.question: Can I keep brand style consistent?
item-5.answer: Use references plus style cues to keep campaigns aligned.

cta.title: Ship campaigns faster with Nano Banana
cta.description: Generate sharp, on-brand visuals in minutes. Refine until every frame clicks.
